remarks: Cancellation law for subtraction.  Deduction form of ~ subcan . Generalization of ~ subcand .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subaddd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subcanad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) = ( A - C ) <-> B = C ) ) $.
